embeds.title: Howzer (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Howzer
Wind-element DPS with cohesive combo potential on Lance: Special Attack → Normal Skill → Ultimate for maximum Bleed-enhanced Crit damage. Gauntlets focuses on Bleed synergy with team-wide Wind damage boosts. Nunchucks provides Stun utility and Crit Resistance debuffs.

embeds.title: Overview
